meta.description: Can Dogmatic - News, opinions and analysis for Muslims worldwide, with special focus on Spanish, Catalan and European speaking countries.
meta.keywords: islam, muslims, islamic news, interfaith dialogue, analysis, opinion, muslim community

presentation.message: We are primarily a website based on news, opinions and analysis that focuses on Muslims around the world and, in particular, in Spanish, Catalan and European speaking countries, but also serving the Islamic world in general. We will remain independent and professional, focused on current affairs, interfaith dialogue and modern doubts.

warning.message: All our affiliates are opposed to violence and all illegal activity. Anyone suggesting or promoting violence or illegal activity in the comments will be permanently banned.

about.title: Our Mission
content: Can Dogmatic was born with the vocation to serve as a communication and understanding bridge for the contemporary Muslim community.
We believe in constructive dialogue, rigorous analysis and truthful information as fundamental axes for a more inclusive society.

members.name: Ahmed Al-Mansour

members.bio: Specialist in interfaith dialogue and gender studies in Islam.

members.bio: Analyst specialized in Islamic world affairs and international relations.
